Detailed Description

Configuration for DAC converter control register.

Definition at line 98 of file lpc17xx_dac.h.

Field Documentation

uint8_t CNT_ENA

-0: Time out counter is disable -1: Time out conter is enable

Definition at line 105 of file lpc17xx_dac.h.

uint8_t DBLBUF_ENA

-0: Disable DACR double buffering -1: when bit CNT_ENA, enable DACR double buffering feature

Definition at line 101 of file lpc17xx_dac.h.

uint8_t DMA_ENA

-0: DMA access is disable -1: DMA burst request

Definition at line 109 of file lpc17xx_dac.h.

uint8_t RESERVED
